title: NBC4 Washington
description:
The NBC4 Washington app connects you with weather, local news and breaking news in Northern Virginia, Maryland and Washington, D.C. Plus, watch NBC4 live, including the TODAY show, NBC Nightly News and your favorite NBC shows. We’re always Working 4 You.
STORM TEAM4 WEATHER
+ Forecasts from Storm Team4, alerting you to severe weather before it strikes in Washington, D.C., Northern Virginia and Maryland
+ Live Storm Team4 radar tracks storms in your neighborhood
+ Weather alerts based on your location
+ 10-day local forecasts & hourly local forecasts
+ Complete school weather closings
NEWS ALERTS & VIDEO
+ Always updated with the latest local news
+ Personalized news alerts
+ Watch video while you read the story
+ 3D touch news widgets on lock screen
INVESTIGATIONS & MORE
+ Exclusive News4 I-Team stories that get results
+ NBC4 Responds solving your consumer problems
+ Watch any NBC4 show live on your phone, including TODAY, NBC Nightly News with Lester Holt, The Voice, This is Us, Days of our Lives and more
This app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.
Do Not Sell My Personal Information https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/notrtoo?brandA=Owned_Stations&intake=NBC4_Washington
